alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Burlington; Camden; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 12:32PM EDT until June 25 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Atlantic County in southern New Jersey... West central Ocean County in southern New Jersey... East central Camden County in southern New Jersey... Southeastern Burlington County in southern New Jersey... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1232 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wharton State Forest, or 27 miles north of Atlantic City, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Hammonton, Tabernacle, Shamong, Presidential Lakes Estates, Pemberton, Wharton State Forest, Presidential Lakes, Atsion, Leisuretowne, Chatsworth, Old Halfway, Browns Mills, Country Lake Estates and Pemberton Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
